doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Dialog Axiata PLC Vs (Ms.) S.P. Charles, Director General of Customs and Others before Hon. Damith Thotawatte, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Dialog Axiata PLC Vs (Ms.) S.P. Charles, Director General of Customs and Others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Customs value, Schedule E of the Customs Ordinance, Non- declaration of freight and insurance, Suppression of material facts, uberrima fides, Doctrine of Clean hands
latest_doc_d.legistation: The Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka. Customs Ordinance No. 17 of 1869 as amended
